title: A Pair of Books Offer Guidance and Hope on How (Not) to Fit In
description: In their graphic memoirs, Abigail Balfe and Liz Montague capture what it’s like to grow up neurodivergent, and how creative outlets helped them find their way.
dc:creator: Lyn Miller-Lachmann
category: A DIFFERENT KIND OF NORMAL: My Real-Life Completely True Story About Being Unique  (Book)
